svg.title: Gonfanôn Icons
svg.desc: Free and modern SVG icon theme designed for webapps.

rdf:Description.dc:creator: Thomas Girard
rdf:Description.dc:title: Gonfanôn Icons
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Webapps icons
rdf:Description.dc:description: Free and modern SVG icon theme designed for webapps.

symbol.title: Star Shape
symbol.desc: Five pointed star

symbol.title: Receptacle Symbol
symbol.desc: Box with flanges

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrow Shape
symbol.desc: Arrow with two points to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrow Shape
symbol.desc: Arrow with two points to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Left-Right-Up-Down Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two perpendicular arrows with two points to opposite direction.

symbol.title: North-West North-East South-East South-West Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two perpendicular arrows in diagonals with two points to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Speed Arrows Symbol
symbol.desc: Two stacked arrows in same direction but with an offset.

symbol.title: Speed Arrows Symbol
symbol.desc: Two stacked arrows in same direction but with an offset.

symbol.title: Both Direction Arrow Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Both Direction Arrow Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked short arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked short arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked short arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Bidirectional Arrows Shape
symbol.desc: Two stacked short arrows to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Carriage Return
symbol.desc: Arrow with corner clockwise.

symbol.title: Right Angle Arrow
symbol.desc: Arrow with corner clockwise.

symbol.title: Chevrons Shape
symbol.desc: Double Angle Quotation Mark.

symbol.title: Chevrons Shape
symbol.desc: Double Angle Bracket.

symbol.title: Refresh Symbol
symbol.desc: Clockwise triangle-headed open circle arrow.

symbol.title: Play Symbol
symbol.desc: Right pointing triangle.

symbol.title: Next Step Symbol
symbol.desc: Right pointing triangle to bar.

symbol.title: Forward Symbol
symbol.desc: Double right pointing triangle.

symbol.title: Jump To Next Symbol
symbol.desc: Double right pointing triangle to bar.

symbol.title: Pause Symbol
symbol.desc: Two vertical and parallel bars.

symbol.title: Stop Symbol
symbol.desc: A square.

symbol.title: Record Symbol
symbol.desc: Round in a circle.

symbol.title: Eject Symbol
symbol.desc: Top pointing triangle from bar.

symbol.title: Fullscreen Symbol
symbol.desc: A point surrounded in diagonal by two triangle to opposite direction.

symbol.title: Compress Symbol
symbol.desc: A point surrounded in diagonal by two triangle directed to it.

symbol.title: Loop Symbol
symbol.desc: Two arrows rotating in clockwise direction.

symbol.title: Shuffle Symbol
symbol.desc: Two plaited arrows in same direction.

symbol.title: Menu Symbol
symbol.desc: 3 horizontal stacked bars
